column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've been here before for brunch
column3: and coffee. It's always SO PACKED no matter when you go
column4: which is the only downside since the space is so small. The best thing about this place are the baked goods and desserts. I've never tried anything I didn't LOVEEE. Their chocolate chip cookies are out of this world. Their croissants are huge in size and good in taste. The desserts are so aesthetically pleasing AND tasty. Their brunch/lunch items are unique and my kind of food. I'm always so happy when I'm here.
